entry.title: Saturday: Periods of drizzle. High 19 with temperature falling to 13 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle or showers early this afternoon. Clearing late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 19 with temperature falling to 13 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low 6 except plus 3 in low lying inland areas. Risk of frost.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low 6 except plus 3 in low lying inland areas. Risk of frost. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Saturday 28 May 2016
